deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update court_case set deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_date = #{acceptDate,jdbcType=DATE}, register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, register_user = #{registerUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, undertake_department = #{undertakeDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, undertake_user = #{undertakeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_date = #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, report_end_date = #{reportEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, actual_end_date = #{actualEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_method = #{endMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_amount = #{registerAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, end_amount = #{endAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, actual_amount = #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, abandon_amount = #{abandonAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_involved = #{caseInvolved,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chief_judge = #{chiefJudge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, program = #{program,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, judge_days = #{judgeDays,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select date_format(accept_date,'%y年%m月') as dateUnit,count(1) number from court_case
group by dateUnit

select CONCAT(date_format(accept_date,'%y年'),quarter(accept_date),'季度') as dateUnit,count(1) number from court_case
group by dateUnit

select date_format(accept_date,'%y年') as dateUnit,count(1) number from court_case
group by dateUnit

select date_format(actual_end_date,'%y年%m月') as dateUnit,count(1) number from court_case
group by dateUnit

select CONCAT(date_format(actual_end_date,'%y年'),quarter(actual_end_date),'季度') as dateUnit,count(1) number from court_case
group by dateUnit

select date_format(actual_end_date,'%y年') as dateUnit,count(1) number from court_case
group by dateUnit

select date_format(actual_end_date,'%y年%m月') as dateUnit,cast(floor(sum(judge_days)/count(1)) as signed) number from court_case
group by dateUnit

select CONCAT(date_format(actual_end_date,'%y年'),quarter(actual_end_date),'季度') as dateUnit,cast(floor(sum(judge_days)/count(1)) as signed) number from court_case
group by dateUnit

select date_format(actual_end_date,'%y年') as dateUnit,cast(floor(sum(judge_days)/count(1)) as signed) number from court_case
group by dateUnit

select end_method as name,count(1) number from court_case
group by end_method
select round(sum(actual_amount)/sum(end_amount)*100,2) actualAmountRate,round(sum(end_amount)/sum(register_amount)*100,2) endAmountRate from court_case

select undertake_department as name,count(1) number from court_case
group by undertake_department

select type as name,count(1) number from court_case
group by type

select status as name,count(1) number from court_case
group by status
select sum(actual_amount) actualAmount,sum(register_amount) registerAmount,sum(end_amount) endAmount,sum(abandon_amount) abandonAmount from court_case

select undertake_user as dateUnit,count(1) number from court_case
group by undertake_user order by number desc

select undertake_user as dateUnit,cast(floor(sum(judge_days)/count(1)) as signed) number from court_case
group by dateUnit order by number asc
